channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Melania Trump Responds to Trump Assassination Attempt
item.description: Melania Trump has just addressed the violent shooting that almost took her husband’s life Saturday. She explains how her and Barron’s life could have ...

item.title: First Photos of Donald Trump Shooter Surface
item.description: The face of the gunman who tried to assassinate former President Donald Trump has now been unmasked -- and he looks like your average adolescent. Phot...

item.title: Donald Trump Won't Delay Trip to Republican Convention Despite Assassination Attempt
item.description: Donald Trump's travel plans aren't changing despite the attempt on his life Saturday ... with the former president saying he's still flying to Milwauk...

item.title: Pennsylvania Officials Identify Victim in Trump Assassination Attempt

item.title: Country Singer Cody Johnson Speaks on Trump Shooting, Encourages People to Vote
item.description: Cody Johnson's got a message for his fans in the aftermath of the attempt on former President Donald Trump's life ... solve your problems with a ballo...
